name: stake-reward-contract
description: A Simple contract projects for staking and minting of rewards for a given holders of a custom BEP20 token

scripts.deploy-test: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --reset && truffle run verify EDIPI StakerMinter --network bscTestnet
scripts.deploy-main: truffle migrate --network bscMainnet --reset && truffle run verify EDIPI StakerMinter --network bscMainnet

author: Alvin Reyes
